amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds from being used by the Secretary of Defense to obligate or expend funds on Afghanistan Infrastructure Fund projects.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 37 printed in House Report 114-623 to prohibit funds from being used by the Secretary of Defense to obligate or expend funds on Afghanistan Infrastructure Fund projects.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A036) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 201 (Roll no. 326).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A036) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 201 (Roll no. 326).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A036) offered by Mr. Walberg.
